name: gigwme
overview:
GigWme will be leading the third wave social platforms and application.

Today a massive amount of information flows on Facebook but only a fraction of it is put at use. The reason implies in the communication model used: “Publish and Broadcast” an asynchronous model that does not take into account the time sensitivity of the information shared. But a lot of the information that flows on social networks is “time sensitive” therefore this model fails.

As results at GigWme we are working on a new platform that provides coordination and synchronization to the information shared on the social network graphs.

Initial focus has been on coordinating and optimizing the consumer free time.
